item.title: Master Historian (Level 12)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Master Author (Level 11)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Weaver
item.description: Investigate old branches by using git reflog

item.title: Collector (Level 4)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Blacksmith (Level 5)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Investigator (Level 6)
item.description: Used git blame to annotate a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 10)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 9)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Apprentice Merchant (Level 2)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Garage Inventor
item.description: Used a custom alias for a Git command

item.title: Seamstress (Level 5)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Master Historian (Level 11)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Master Presenter (Level 11)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Let there be light
item.description: Commit without a parent.

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 8)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Master Author (Level 10)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Apprentice Archivist (Level 2)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Master Historian (Level 10)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Master Banker (Level 7)
item.description: Join two or more development histories together with git merge.

item.title: Investigator (Level 5)
item.description: Used git blame to annotates a file with information about how each line changed.
